name: Lola's Adventure
description:
Overview
Lola's wish is to build up the birdhouse that her parents promised to do with her ages ago, but they never seem to find the time to actually do it. Lola takes the matter into her own hands and faces somewhat surprising difficulties.

Controls
Leftclick - walking and interacting with objects or talking to people
Rightclick - find out what Lola thinks about an Object
Mousewheel up/down | i - open and close your inventory
Space - highlight all objects that Lola can interact with
Esc - Go back to the main menu

Language
German voices with English or German subtitles

Information
This is a very short point & click adventure I made for my Maturapaper.  It is my very first time, making a whole game. I used Visionaire Studio 5 to make it. 

Thanks for playing!
